mapper.sql: bhbc.ht_badness_cause_id, bhbc.badness_cause_id, bhbc.badness_cause_code, bhbc.badness_cause_desc, bhbc.badness_grade, bhbc.badness_category_id, bhbc.`status`, bhbc.remark, bhbc.org_id, bhbc.create_user_id, bhbc.create_time, bhbc.modified_user_id, bhbc.modified_time, bhbc.is_delete
mapper.select:
select, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name, bbca.badness_category_code,bbca.badness_category_desc from base_ht_badness_cause bhbc left join sys_user su on bhbc.create_user_id = su.user_id left join sys_user sus on bhbc.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bhbc.org_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN base_badness_category bbca ON bhbc.badness_category_id = bbca.badness_category_id
and date_format(bhbc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and bhbc.badness_cause_code like CONCAT('%',#{badnessCauseCode},'%')
and bhbc.badness_cause_desc like CONCAT('%',#{badnessCauseDesc},'%')
and bhbc.org_id=#{orgId}
order by bhbc.modified_time desc
